moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Morning Sun
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
